content.rendered:
If you are curious about how it works, you don’t need to rent expensive recording studios, you can do your first steps with Autotune directly from the microphone of your smartphone with these Android apps.

Voloco: Vocal Studio

Voloco automatically removes background noise and lets you correct the pitch of your voice to stay in tune. Voloco also gives you a variety of presets for compression, EQ, and reverb effects to polish your recording to perfection.

Applying Voloco effects to audio you record elsewhere is easy. You can also apply Voloco effects to the voices of pre-recorded videos. This app offers 50+ effects bundled into 12 preset packs.

tune me

Tune Me is an app that is specifically designed to record hip-hop and R&B tracks, although it can obviously still be used for other types of musical genres. You can record your voice and add modifications such as Autotune, pitch changes and more than 50 effects and rhythms to accompany your recording.

Tune Me App

Another important function is its wave display and equalizer, which allows you to identify and correct each sound in your recording with perfect precision.

AudioLab

AudioLab is one of the most complete audio editors that exist for Android. In order to modify your voice, it includes functions such as audio trimming (cut, trim, copy, paste, add silence, fade, undo, redo), audio mix (mix four audios, change speed and pitch, DJ effects and filters), detailed tag editing, audio merger, audio recorder, audio converter, music player, voice editor and many more features.

At the Autotune level, it can be a bit complicated to use if you are a beginner, because it is more focused on a somewhat more professional audience, but since it is free, you can always try to see if you can get hold of it.

Voice changer, voice recorder and editor

Despite the lack of commerciality of its name and simply being a description of its functions, this app is quite interesting. If you prefer to take the upper hand and be the one who modifies your voice to your liking, you will like this app.

Voice Effects App

Its main function is to modify your voice with Autotune, Voicemod, etc. Song recording can be done in different qualities, from 32 kbps to 320 kbps. In addition to processing the recorded voice and adding more than 20 voice effects, the voice and music editor functionality is suitable for karaoke lovers.
